humanDirector.title: Redefining Humanity
humanDirector.description: Humans are responsible for discovering problems and seeing them through to the end.

aiWorkforce.title: Self-Evolution
aiWorkforce.description: Autonomously cycling through learning and improvement to continuously achieve goals.

profitable.title: Profitable Management
profitable.description: Providing socially necessary businesses with ethics to generate economic impact.

business.title: Business
business.description:
Whether in-house or client work,
we focus on "reclaiming time" with AI.

aiWorkflow.name: AI Workflow Design
aiWorkflow.description: We handle everything from AI workflow design for business automation to implementation, knowledge base construction, and operation. Using tools like n8n, we realize safe and reproducible automation.

shefitHome.name: Shefit-Home (formerly PATTORE)
shefitHome.description: Developing efficient businesses using AI. Shefit-Home, a personal training service for women, uses AI to support initial trainer matching, maintaining high quality with a small team.

appDevelopment.name: App Development
appDevelopment.description: High-speed app development using AI to produce apps that benefit the world. Currently, we have apps like 'G-Test Pass Drill' created by AI.

values.title: Value
values.description: The following three are the axes of our decision-making.

humanFirst.title: Human First
humanFirst.description: All automation is merely a means for 'people to live more like humans'. If it doesn't fit the purpose, we don't automate.

fullAutomation.title: Full Automation
fullAutomation.description: Leave everything except judgment only humans can do to AI. Create an environment where people can focus on questions and creation.

openPlaybook.title: Open Source Know-How
openPlaybook.description: Share gained know-how with society and increase partners for co-creation. Create a chain reaction and promote the update of humanity as a whole.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We will review your inquiry and get back to you.

form.name: NAME
form.subject: SUBJECT
form.success: Your message has been sent. We will contact you within 24 hours.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
form.note: We aim to reply within 24 hours
